import sys
import math

n = int(sys.stdin.readline().strip())
if n == 1:
    print("YES")
    print("1 1")
else:
    print("NO")

import sys

n = int(sys.stdin.readline())

if n == 1:
    print("YES")
    print("2 1")
    print("1 2")
else:
